description: Every year the owners of Yak and Yeti lead a 15 day trek to the Mt. Everest Region. The trek begins at Lukla (Gateway to Everest) from an elevation of 9,200ft to Everest Base camp which has an approximate elevation of 18,000 ft. During this trip, you will experience himalayan culture, lifestyle and immerse yourself in the laps of beautiful himalayan mountains.
